item.title: CVE-2023-2957|2024-08-02T06:41:04.065Z -- lisa%20software -- florist%20site
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Lisa Software Florist Site allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Florist Site: before 3.0.
